flawed_nl_solution:
There are twice as many penguins as giraffes, so there are 5 * 2 = <<5*2=10>>10 penguins.
The penguins make up 20% of all animals, so there are 100/20 * 10 = <<100/20*10=50>>50 animals in the whole Zoo.
4% of animals are elephants, so there are 4/100 * 50 = <<4/100*50=1250>>1250 elephants at the Zoo.
#### 1250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 1250. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
